alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Latimer (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 6:02AM CDT until April 05 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM CDT FOR SOUTHERN HASKELL AND NORTH CENTRAL LATIMER COUNTIES... At 601 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kinta, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Wilburton... Stigler... Mccurtain... Kinta... Mc Curtain... Lequire... Robbers Cave State Park... Kanima... Lewisville... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for southeastern Oklahoma. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
